user_instruction: 'Send an update to Mark Thompson (mark.thompson@sportsfuture.org), a non-profit representative, about how the athletes are doing. You can check out my Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Latest Athlete Progress Update

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. Could you please put together a brief update on how our supported athletes are progressing—recent performance results, training milestones, any concerns, and upcoming plans? Feel free to pull whatever you need from Gmail, our shared calendar, or Notion.

I’d like to share the update with the Foundation team by the end of the week, so anything you can send over in the next couple of days would be perfect.

Thanks so much for your help!

Best,
Mark

final_output:
Subject: Request for Latest Athlete Progress Update

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. Could you please put together a brief update on how our supported athletes are progressing—recent performance results, training milestones, any concerns, and upcoming plans? Feel free to pull whatever you need from Gmail, our shared calendar, or Notion.

I’d like to share the update with the Foundation team by the end of the week, so anything you can send over in the next couple of days would be perfect.

Thanks so much for your help!

Best,
Mark
